Description.Name: Magnothermic Plasma Conduit
Description.Details: These reinforced transfer lines are engineered to channel superheated, magnetically-contained plasma from fusion cores to TEMPEST-equipped weapon systems. Constructed from layered ferro-ceramic alloys and laced with electromagnetic stabilizers, Magnothermic Plasma Conduits maintain plasma coherence under immense pressure and heat. Any rupture can trigger violent chain reactions, making them both vital and dangerously volatile components of superheavy-grade plasma amplification systems.
